question: Describe Badi Lake. Who constructed it, when, and in whose honor was it named?

question: Describe some of the sensory experiences one might encounter in Varanasi.

The fragrance of incense mingles with the mouthwatering aroma of freshly prepared street food, enticing visitors to indulge in culinary delights unique to this sacred city.
